thread.title: Alicia Silverstone Isn't Clueless -- She's Clothes-less!
thread.title_full: Alicia Silverstone Isn't Clueless -- She's Clothes-less! | The Huffington Post

author: huffingtonpost.com
title: Alicia Silverstone Isn't Clueless -- She's Clothes-less!
text:
PETA Winter is coming, but “Clueless” star Alicia Silverstone doesn’t want you to wear wool.
And she’s making her point by not wearing anything at all.
The 40-year-old actress and mother’s tasteful nude image appears in a new ad for the animal rights group PETA on a New York City billboard.
“I’d Rather Go Naked Than Wear Wool,” the caption says.
Silverstone said in a PETA-produced video that the shearing process for sheep isn’t benign, as some might believe.
“ They’re cut, they’re harmed , they get very seriously wounded,” she said. “And there’s no care for them when they’re wounded.”
E! notes that Silverstone is among many celebrities —including Taraji P. Henson, Khloe Kardashian and Olivia Munn ― to pose in their birthday suits in support of animal rights.
